hjb.jms
Class SessionMessageFactory

java.lang.Object
  hjb.jms.SessionMessageFactory
public class SessionMessageFactory
extends Object

SessionMessageFactory allows Sessions to be used a 'keyed' factory for Messages, with the key being the class name of the Message.

Author:
Tim Emiola

          Creates a SessionMessageFactory from Session.

Constructor Detail

SessionMessageFactory

public SessionMessageFactory(Session theSession)
Creates a SessionMessageFactory from Session.

Parameters:
theSession - the Session which will be used to create the Messages
Method Detail

createMessage

public Message createMessage(HJBMessage hjbMessage)
                      throws HJBException
Creates Message based on the contents of hjbMessage

Parameters:
hjbMessage - an HJBMessage Uses the value of the header named MessageCopierFactory.HJB_JMS_CLASS to determine what message type to create.
Returns:
a JMS Message
Throws:
HJBException - if a problem occurs while creating the Message

createMessage

public Message createMessage(String messageClazz)
                      throws HJBException
Establishes a link between a JMS message class name, and the Session API method used to create instances of that class.

Parameters:
messageClazz - an JMS message class name
Returns:
an instance of messageClazz, created using this instances Session
Throws:
HJBException - if messageClazz is invalid, or if any other problem occurs during Message instantiation
